name: dereuromark/cakephp-queue
description: The Queue plugin for CakePHP provides deferred task execution.

suggest.friendsofcake/search: For admin backend and filtering of current jobs.
suggest.dereuromark/cakephp-tools: For the Email lib and QueueEmailTask. Or write your own task here. Also for admin backend.
suggest.dereuromark/cakephp-ide-helper: For maximum IDE support, especially around createJob() usage.

scripts.phpstan-setup: cp composer.json composer.backup && composer require --dev phpstan/phpstan && mv composer.backup composer.json
scripts.test-setup: [ ! -f phpunit.phar ] && wget https://phar.phpunit.de/phpunit-6.5.8.phar && mv phpunit-6.5.8.phar phpunit.phar || true
